text: Euphorbia orthoclada is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Madagascar. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests, subtropical or tropical dry shrubland, and rocky areas. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Madagascar orthoclada Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by John Gilbert Baker
title: Euphorbia orthoclada
